soul-knit.context: Beginning of David and Jonathan's friendship
soul-knit.english: The soul of Jonathan was knit to the soul of David

nothing-hinders.context: Before attacking the Philistine garrison alone
nothing-hinders.hebrew: אֵין לַיהוָה מַעְצוֹר לְהוֹשִׁיעַ בְּרַב אוֹ בִמְעָט
nothing-hinders.english: Nothing can hinder the LORD from saving by many or by few

go-in-peace.hebrew: לֵךְ לְשָׁלוֹם... יְהוָה יִהְיֶה בֵּינִי וּבֵינֶךָ
go-in-peace.english: Go in peace, for we have sworn friendship in the name of the LORD

why-should-he-die.english: Why should he be put to death? What has he done?

how-mighty-fallen.english: How the mighty have fallen... Your love was more wonderful to me than the love of women

you-shall-be-king.english: You shall be king over Israel, and I shall be next to you
